channel.title: Price help
channel.description:
Hello,
I've forgot how to change the price in shop ..Is it with item.cfg or with another one ?
If item.cfg tel me which to change:
ex: [code]item = 4755 Veracs_flail Verac_the_Defiled's_flail. 150000 150000 150000 0 80 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 80 0[/code]

item.title: Price help
item.dc:creator: @strengthxlx strengthxlx
item.description:
@strengthxlx wrote:

First one is Buy price, second is sell price

Read full topic

item.title: Price help
item.dc:creator: @deamerdude deamerdude
item.description:
@deamerdude wrote:

Ok this is very simple.
When it Says item = 4755 Veracs_flail Verac_the_Defiled’s_flail. 150000 150000 150000…
you would want to change the first 150000, then thats it.

Read full topic
